description.en: A minimalist shoulder tote with long straps and a clean rectangular silhouette. Features a zip-top closure and roomy interior—ideal for commuting, daily essentials, and light travel. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), size, logo, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 极简风单肩托特包，长肩带设计，包型简洁利落。顶部拉链闭合，内部空间充足，适合通勤、日常与轻旅行使用。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery / leather patch (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：长肩带（加固，可定制）
五金：拉链头等（金属电镀颜色可定制）
Logo：织标/胶章/刺绣/皮标（可定制）

en.Use Case: Commuting, work, daily carry, light travel
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
